source.name: AWS Cloudtrail
source.description: Amazon CloudTrail logs provide detailed information on AWS API calls, including request parameters, timestamps, and user identities, for auditing and security analysis.

source.name: AWS WAF
source.description: Amazon WAF logs provide detailed information on HTTP requests, blocked or allowed traffic, rule evaluations, and security events.

source.name: AWS ELB
source.description: Amazon ElasticLoad Balancer logs provide detailed information on HTTP/S request activities, including client IPs, request paths, response statuses, and latency metrics for monitoring and analysis.

source.name: AWS VPCflow
source.description: Amazon VPC-Flow logs capture and send detailed records of network traffic flow within and between VPCs, including source and destination IP addresses, ports, and traffic acceptance or rejection.

source.name: AWS Guardduty
source.description: Amazon Guardduty Logs include security findings related to suspicious activity, unauthorized access, and potential threats detected in AWS environments.

source.name: AWS Cloudwatch
source.description: AWS CloudWatch logs include detailed records of system and application events, including performance metrics, error messages, and operational data for monitoring and troubleshooting AWS resources.

source.name: AWS Transit Gateway
source.description: Amazon Transit Gateway Logs capture and send detailed records of network traffic traversing the Transit Gateway, including source and destination IPs, ports, and traffic acceptance or rejection.

source.name: AWS Cloudfront
source.description: AWS CloudFront logs include detailed records of HTTP/HTTPS requests made to CloudFront distributions, including requesters' IP addresses, requested URLs, response status, and timestamps.

source.name: AWS Security Hub
source.description: AWS Security Hub logs aggregate security findings, enabling efficient monitoring and response to threats across AWS environment.

source.name: AWS Inspector
source.description: Amazon Inspector logs include detailed findings of security vulnerabilities, configuration issues, and compliance violations identified during automated assessments of AWS resources.

source.name: AWS S3 Access
source.description: AWS S3 Access logs include detailed records of requests made to S3 buckets, such as requester information, request type, response status, and timestamps.

source.name: AWS Route53
source.description: AWS Route 53 logs include detailed records of DNS queries, including domain names queried, response types, and query timestamps for monitoring and analysis.

source.name: Azure Active-Directory Signinlogs

source.name: Azure Active-Directory Activity logs
source.description: Azure Activity logs include details on user, application usage, administrative activities, conditional access, and risk detections.

source.name: Azure Active-Directory Provisioning logs

source.name: Azure Firewall

source.name: Azure Application Gateway
